channel.title: Version 5.8 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 5.8.1 (2022-12-11) Fixes [bug] theme: fix alias fer home plank if defaultContentLanguageInSubdir=true #414 5.8.0 (2022-12-08) Enhancements [feature] ay'con: add new shortcode #412 [feature] theme: style an' document markdown extensions #411 [feature] badge: add new shortcode #410 [feature] theme: add accent color #409 Fixes [bug] theme: fix spac'n fer tag flyout 'n FF #413
